TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConditionedActivityGroup extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity implements class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>
Public NotInheritable Class ConditionedActivityGroup Inherits CompositeActivity Implements IActivityEventListener(Of ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs)
type ConditionedActivityGroup = class inherit CompositeActivity interface IActivityEventListener<ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 為一組子活動提供條件約束執行內容的定義。

span.span: Provides the definition of a constraint-based execution context for a set of child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活動是 ，這表示 活動可包含其他活動。The activity is a , meaning the activity can contain other activities. 活動執行，並根據其 `when` 條件的評估重新執行子活動。The activity runs and re-executes child activities based on the evaluation of their `when` conditions. 只要根據其資料和狀態變更相依性而需要評估時，評估所有規則。All rules are evaluated whenever required based on their data and state change dependencies. 當 的完成規則評估為 `true` 時，它會立即取消任何目前執行的子活動並完成。When the completion rule of the evaluates to `true`, it immediately cancels any currently executing child activities and finishes.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出 應何時完成。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when the should complete.

span.span: A condition that determines whether the should complete.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 設為 `null`，這表示 `BookingCAG` 類別將永遠不會完成。The following code example shows how to set the to `null`, which means the `BookingCAG` class never completes. 這個程式碼範例是 SimpleCAGWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜ConditionedActivityGroup SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the ConditionedActivityGroup SDK Sample from the SimpleCAGWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984)。For more information, see [Using ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).
